fields_of_interest: Trade, Competition, Consumers, International co-operation and development, Employment and Social Affairs, Business and Industry, Single market, Regional Policy, Trans-European Networks, Public Health, Digital economy and society, Communication, Banking and financial services, Fraud prevention
eu_initiatives: GDPR, digital economy and society, digital single market, DIGIT, DG CONNECT, Research, Science and Innovation, Cybersecurity, free flow of data, Wifi4EU, industry, entrepreneurship and SMEs, Data economy, 5G Action Plan, Smart cities/Mobility
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: 4LifeSupport has set its goal to give every individual the chance to develop full control and self-determination and to facilitate and preserve these rights which will improve the quality of life in the broadest sense. The members of 4lifeSupport develop high quality technical solutions and make these solutions available through a personal and unique 4LifeBox. The 4LifeBox enables the individual, and only the individual to get and keep full control of his or her personal records so that the individual as owner of these records can trust that this trust cannot be breached in any form or way.
